scripts.egov-ui-kit-config: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/config --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/config --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-redux: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/redux --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/redux --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-utils: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/utils --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/utils --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-commons: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/common --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/common --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-hocs: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/hocs --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/hocs --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-assets: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/assets --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/assets --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit: npm run egov-ui-kit-components && npm run egov-ui-kit-redux && npm run egov-ui-kit-utils && npm run egov-ui-kit-commons && npm run egov-ui-kit-custom-icons && npm run egov-ui-kit-hocs && npm run egov-ui-kit-assets && npm run egov-ui-kit-config
